For those interested in the history of Ft. Myer= I wonder if Col Duggan could be persuaded to do an article on the brief history of South Post Ft. Myer... there is very little out there...i was stationed there '67-'69, then moved up to North Post in '69, and was the first person to live at Barrack 406, which was recently knocked down. I was in Headquarters Company with duty in the Pentagon War Room..i am planning a visit to Myer in the fall and would love an hour with Col Duggan....meanwhile, you can look at my website at www.FortMyerVaMemories.com  and, i have alot more to post !
